allow:
Bash(powershell.exe -File - <<'PSEOF'
Add-Type -AssemblyName System.Drawing
$dir = "c:\\Users\\light\\WebstormProjects\\portfolio\\public\\design"
Get-ChildItem "$dir\\*.png" | ForEach-Object {
    $img = [System.Drawing.Image]::FromFile\($_.FullName\)
    Write-Output "$\($_.Name\): $\($img.Width\)x$\($img.Height\)"
    $img.Dispose\(\)
}
PSEOF)
